Job Description: Job Description:      Temenos is looking for Passionate and strong   Senior Software Development Engineer   for our Quantum team. If you are the kind of person who loves the challenges associated with development of Mobility platform, then this could be your dream job!           Roles & Responsibilities:       Innovate, architect and design features as required, collaborate with other feature teams        Participate in the full life - cycle development process from design, development/code, test, release and maintenance        Draft Technical specifications & review of component/feature documents.       Help team in key challenges around design, performances, scalability        Mentor and groom junior engineers. Provide technical guidance to other team members        Help customers and work with support team as needed        Required Experience & Skills:        Engineering or Technical Degrees (BE/B.Tech/ME/M.Tech/M.Sc./MCA)        3+ years of Relevant Technical experience        Excellent design, coding, debugging and testing skills        Strong knowledge of Java and data structures        Hands on Experience in Spring, Hibernate and server - side stack        Database Fundamentals, SQL Tuning       Unit Testing (JUnit/TestNG)       Build Tooling (hands - on on any one or more Ant, Maven, Gradle)       Message Broker Fundamentals       JavaScript, AngularJS       Experience across various application servers and databases would help.
